arez.when

Class When

  • java.lang.Object
    • arez.when.When

  • public final class When
extends Object
    The utility class providing watcher methods.

    • Method Detail

      • when

        public static Observer when(@Nonnull
                            SafeFunction<Boolean> condition,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeProcedure effect)
        Wait until a condition is true, then run effect. The effect is run in a read-only transaction. See when(String, boolean, SafeFunction, SafeProcedure) for further details.
        Parameters:
        condition - The function that determines when the effect is run.
        effect - The procedure that is executed when the condition is true.
        Returns:
        the Observer representing the reactive component. The user can dispose the node if it is no longer required.

      • when

        public static Observer when(boolean mutation,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeFunction<Boolean> condition,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeProcedure effect)
        Wait until a condition is true, then run effect. See when(String, boolean, SafeFunction, SafeProcedure) for further details.
        Parameters:
        mutation - true if the effect can mutate state, false otherwise.
        condition - The function that determines when the effect is run.
        effect - The procedure that is executed when the condition is true.
        Returns:
        the Observer representing the reactive component. The user can dispose the node if it is no longer required.

      • when

        public static Observer when(@Nullable
                            String name,
                            boolean mutation,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeFunction<Boolean> condition,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeProcedure effect)
        Wait until a condition is true, then run effect. See when(Component, String, boolean, SafeFunction, SafeProcedure, int, boolean) for further details.
        Parameters:
        name - the debug name (if any) used when naming the underlying Arez resources.
        mutation - true if the effect can mutate state, false otherwise.
        condition - The function that determines when the effect is run.
        effect - The procedure that is executed when the condition is true.
        Returns:
        the Observer representing the reactive component. The user can dispose the node if it is no longer required.

      • when

        public static Observer when(@Nullable
                            String name,
                            boolean mutation,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeFunction<Boolean> condition,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeProcedure effect,
                            boolean runImmediately)
        Wait until a condition is true, then run effect. See when(Component, String, boolean, SafeFunction, SafeProcedure, int, boolean) for further details.
        Parameters:
        name - the debug name (if any) used when naming the underlying Arez resources.
        mutation - true if the effect can mutate state, false otherwise.
        condition - The function that determines when the effect is run.
        effect - The procedure that is executed when the condition is true.
        runImmediately - true to invoke condition immediately, false to schedule reaction for next reaction cycle.
        Returns:
        the Observer representing the reactive component. The user can dispose the node if it is no longer required.

      • when

        public static Observer when(@Nullable
                            String name,
                            boolean mutation,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeFunction<Boolean> condition,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeProcedure effect,
                            int priority,
                            boolean runImmediately)
        Wait until a condition is true, then run effect. See when(Component, String, boolean, SafeFunction, SafeProcedure, int, boolean) for further details.
        Parameters:
        name - the debug name (if any) used when naming the underlying Arez resources.
        mutation - true if the effect can mutate state, false otherwise.
        condition - The function that determines when the effect is run.
        effect - The procedure that is executed when the condition is true.
        priority - the priority of the observer. Must be one of the PRIORITY_* flags in Flags.
        runImmediately - true to invoke condition immediately, false to schedule reaction for next reaction cycle.
        Returns:
        the Observer representing the reactive component. The user can dispose the node if it is no longer required.

      • when

        public static Observer when(@Nullable
                            Component component,
                            @Nullable
                            String name,
                            boolean mutation,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeFunction<Boolean> condition,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeProcedure effect,
                            int priority,
                            boolean runImmediately)
        Wait until a condition is true, then run effect. The condition function is run in a read-only, tracking transaction and will be re-evaluated any time any of the observed elements are updated. The effect procedure is run in either a read-only or read-write, non-tracking transaction.
        Parameters:
        component - the component containing when observer if any. Should be null if Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false.
        name - the debug name (if any) used when naming the underlying Arez resources.
        mutation - true if the effect can mutate state, false otherwise.
        condition - The function that determines when the effect is run.
        effect - The procedure that is executed when the condition is true.
        priority - the priority of the observer. Must be one of the PRIORITY_* flags in Flags.
        runImmediately - true to invoke condition immediately, false to schedule reaction for next reaction cycle.
        Returns:
        the Observer representing the reactive component. The user can dispose the node if it is no longer required.

      • when

        public static Observer when(@Nullable
                            Component component,
                            @Nullable
                            String name,
                            boolean mutation,
                            boolean verifyActionRequired,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeFunction<Boolean> condition,
                            @Nonnull
                            SafeProcedure effect,
                            int priority,
                            boolean runImmediately)
        Wait until a condition is true, then run effect. The condition function is run in a read-only, tracking transaction and will be re-evaluated any time any of the observed elements are updated. The effect procedure is run in either a read-only or read-write, non-tracking transaction.
        Parameters:
        component - the component containing when observer if any. Should be null if Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false.
        name - the debug name (if any) used when naming the underlying Arez resources.
        mutation - true if the effect can mutate state, false otherwise.
        verifyActionRequired - true if the effect will add invariant checks to ensure reads or writes occur within the scope of the effect.
        condition - The function that determines when the effect is run.
        effect - The procedure that is executed when the condition is true.
        priority - the priority of the observer. Must be one of the PRIORITY_* flags in Flags.
        runImmediately - true to invoke condition immediately, false to schedule reaction for next reaction cycle.
        Returns:
        the Observer representing the reactive component. The user can dispose the node if it is no longer required.
